roleset.name: give new life
roleset.note: REANIMATE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from reanimate.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: This book has reanimated my interest in the forbidden arts.
example.arg: my interest in the forbidden arts

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: Forty-eight hours later he reanimated, but life is not what it used to be.
